column4: so i just upgrade to feisty and now i have no windows decorations, someone help?
are there any packages left unconfigured? 'sudo dpkg --configure -a'
or yes.. are you using beryl ;)

there are many improvements, especially speedups. you may want to consider backing up and making a fresh install. it's likely that your prior desktop settings have become broken after the upgrade. i have no idea why.
